Class signals.AsyncSignal


Extends signals.Signal.

Fields borrowed from class signals.Signal:
active
Methods borrowed from class signals.Signal:
add, addOnce, dispatch, dispose, getNumListeners, halt, remove, removeAll, toString

Defined in: signals.js.

Class Detail
signals.AsyncSignal()

The AsyncSignal is a special kind of Signal which will save a reference to previously dispatched messages and will execute binding during add/addOnce if Signal was previously dispatched.

Field Detail
reset

Reset AsyncSignal to state before first dispatch, so it won't be automatically dispatched on the next add/addOnce.
